3.doc: ErrorText is shown instead of SupportingText, even if they are (today) independent
3.name: ErrorText

4.doc: Value contains the text, which shall be shown.
4.name: Value

6.doc: InputValue is a binding to a state, into which the frontend will the user entered text. This is the pointer a State.
6.name: InputValue

7.doc: Style to apply. Use TextFieldReduced in forms where many textfields cause too much visual noise and you need to reduce it. By default, the TextFieldOutlined is applied.
7.name: Style

8.doc: DebounceTime is in nanoseconds. A zero or omitted value means to enable debounce default logic.
8.name: DebounceTime

9.doc: Lines enforces a single line if <= 0, otherwise it shows the amount of text lines within a text area.
9.name: Lines

12.doc: DisableDebounce must be set to true, to disable the default debouncer logic. This will cause a render roundtrip for each keystroke, so be careful not to break the server or cause UX issues due to UI latencies.
12.name: DisableDebounce

14.doc: If Revealed the password is shown
14.name: Revealed

15.doc: Id represents an optional identifier to locate this component within the view tree. It must be either empty or unique within the entire tree instance.
15.name: Id
